column4: I'm not looking for a forum, I have to get this done within the hour
I have to give this computer that I'm on to a friend, and I need to get the one right next to me working before I give it to him, or I'll be computerless
that's too bad...Try using Google for specific troubleshooting guidance. You'll get it!
were there accompanying documents related to teh drivers where you got them?
I wish I knew what you just said =(
I looked at the page you posted, let me see...
check the bottom of this page to start with: http://art.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=7137160
how does that apply to me? I DO have a wnda3100
my bad, check this instead: http://paste.ubuntu.com/317436/
just put all of that into the terminal on my other computer?
no one thing at a time, and take your time.
when I put in the first command, It said "W: Failed to fetch http://......." for all of the links
your issue is complicated because the box you are working on does not ave access to the Internet. Can you get to a wired connection?
unfortunately no. If you had a wired connection, or had someone skilled with Linux at your side you would have a chance...sorry
